title: Requires certified social workers in each elementary, intermediate, middle, junior high and senior high school
summary: Requires at least one full-time social worker to be employed in each elementary, intermediate, middle and junior high school throughout the state.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          937

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. ORTIZ, JACOBS, WEISENBERG, McENENY, COOK, ROBIN-
         SON, BOYLAND -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. CUSICK, TOWNS  --  read
         once and referred to the Committee on Education

       AN  ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring a certified
         social worker in each elementary, intermediate,  middle,  junior  high
         and senior high school

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The education law is amended by adding a new section  803-b
    2  to read as follows:
    3    S  803-B.  CERTIFIED SOCIAL WORKERS REQUIRED IN ELEMENTARY, INTERMEDI-
    4  ATE, MIDDLE, JUNIOR HIGH AND SENIOR HIGH SCHOOLS.  THE BOARD  OF  EDUCA-
    5  TION  OR  TRUSTEES  OF  EVERY  SCHOOL DISTRICT IN THE STATE SHALL ON AND
    6  AFTER JULY FIRST, TWO THOUSAND ELEVEN  EMPLOY  AT  LEAST  ONE  CERTIFIED
    7  SOCIAL  WORKER IN EACH OF THE SCHOOLS UNDER THEIR JURISDICTION EXCLUSIVE
    8  OF ANY SOCIAL WORKERS FUNDED OR MANDATED THROUGH ANY  SPECIAL  EDUCATION
    9  FUNDING, AID, REGULATION OR STATUTE.  SUCH CERTIFIED SOCIAL WORKER SHALL
   10  PERFORM SUCH DUTIES INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO:  HELPING STUDENTS WHO
   11  EXHIBIT  ANY  ATTENDANCE,  ACADEMIC,  BEHAVIORAL OR ADJUSTMENT PROBLEMS,
   12  EDUCATING STUDENTS CONCERNING AVOIDANCE OF CHILD SEXUAL ABUSE, ENCOURAG-
   13  ING PARENTAL INVOLVEMENT AND HELPING STUDENTS PREVENT OR  RESOLVE  PROB-
   14  LEMS CAUSED BY SOCIAL OR EMOTIONAL STRESS.
   15    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03643-01-1
